name: Football Special Edition 2019
additionalNotes:
The La Flor Dominicana Football Special Edition 2019 is a 6 1/2 x 58 size that is oftentimes associated with the company’s Factory Press line, though the most notable feature starts about halfway down the cigar: an image of a football made by pieces of tobacco.

As for the blend, it’s all Dominican on the inside, with Ecuadorian habano and Connecticut accents for the wrapper. Pricing is be set at $16 per cigar and it will be sold in boxes of 10.

Like the four Football Special Editions before it, the cigar will only be sold in the state where the Super Bowl is hosted, this time Atlanta, Georgia.

https://halfwheel.com/la-flor-dominicana-football-special-edition-2019-heading-to-georgia-next-year/284280
